review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: The notion of “The Path\" and the “steps\" is to support your growing ability to
            handle stress, be resilient and successful. It is the recognition that all these goals are achieved through
            a developmental process. A step by step process. Did you take the step, yesterday, of developing your
            ability to be persistent? That put you on The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Strengthening your inner voice’s focus on loving yourself and self-compassion (Pillar #1)
step_of_the_day.content:
“I was shocked when I came to the West to see so much self-hatred, instead of self-compassion\" The Dalai
            LamaHow you treat yourself is at the heart of your ability to be and stay in balance. And this determines how
            resilient and successful you will be. The Dalai Lama’s observation is both accurate and sad, that we tend to
            treat ourselves more negatively.Self-compassion is like an emotional “balm\" that soothes our wounds and our mistakes. It thus helps us
            recover from the slings and arrows of life. Those who think that being hard on themselves results in better
            performance are operating under a painful illusion that has the opposite result, leaving us feeling less
            worthy and beaten down.

action_step:
Identify some of your mistakes, emotional wounding, or losses. As you reflect on them, hear your developing
            healthy internal parent – coming from a place of love – show you, and express to you compassion. If you find
            this difficult to do, think about how you respond to a close friend or relative who experiences a loss and
            how caring you are with them. Turn that expression back onto yourself.image.png
journal_entry: Write about how you are doing with the development of your healthy internal voice.
